definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The box was full of sand.
Cantaloup is a large fruit, and it grows on sandy soil.
sentences.chinese: 香瓜是一种大型的水果，而它生长在沙土上。

sentences.english: But in the sandy land, the change tendency of the soil moisture content is opposite to the clay land.
sentences.chinese: 而在沙土地，土壤含水量的变化趋势与黏土地相反。

sentences.english: But at the edges, where the ice has had a chance to melt, all that's left is powdery sand.
sentences.chinese: 但是边缘上的冰比较容易融化，留下粉末状的沙土。

sentences.english: Water filters through the sandy soil and into the well.
sentences.chinese: 水漏过沙土后流进井里。

sentences.english: I chose one that was still wet from the morning dew with traces of dirt and sand on its skin.
sentences.chinese: 我挑了一个，上面还带有朝露的湿气并沾着点沙土。

sentences.english: Loams are easy soils to work and combine the good properties of sandy and clay soils.
sentences.chinese: 这种土壤利于种植，并具有沙土和黏土的优点。

sentences.english: The rock has weathered away into soil.
This gravelly soil is well drained and good for growing root crops.
sentences.chinese: 这沙土地利于排水，适于种植块根作物。

sentences.english: The channel had chocked up with sand so that boats couldn't use it.
sentences.chinese: 航道被沙土淤积堵塞，因此船舶不能使用它了。

sentences.english: Water filters through sandy soil and into the well.
After you pan out the dirt and sand there might be some gold left.
sentences.chinese: 淘掉沙土后，也许有些金子留下来。

sentences.english: I sat cross-legged in the sand and contemplated my life.
sentences.chinese: 我在沙土趺坐检视自己的人生。

sentences.english: Walking a few yards from the pit, I kicked disgustedly at the dirt.
sentences.chinese: 我从沙坑里走出几码远，气愤地踢着沙土。

sentences.english: Infield is square and with red sand, each corner with a base.
sentences.chinese: 内场呈正方形，为红沙土场地，四角各设一个垒位。

sentences.english: cat litter or sand for icy walkways.
sentences.chinese: 用于铺在冰冷的通道上猫砂或者是沙土。

definition: crushed or broken rock, stone etc
sandy beach or river bank/sand dune/sandy land
